headline: Ross Stores Turns Retail Bankruptcies Into Potential Multi Quarter Margin Tailwind
summary: Ross Stores (NasdaqGS:ROST) is seeing a surge of deeply discounted inventory following a wave of mid tier retail bankruptcies. The influx of excess merchandise is expected to support Ross Stores' off price model over multiple quarters. Management is positioned to source branded goods at lower costs, which may support margins over time. For you as an investor, this matters because Ross Stores runs a large off price apparel and home fashion chain that relies on buying quality brands at a...
